mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, M_PASSWD, M_NAME, M_EMAIL, M_PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS2, M_JOB, M_ROLE, M_REGDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID=#{mem_id} AND M_PASSWD=#{m_passwd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_ID, M_PASSWD, M_NAME, M_EMAIL, M_PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS2, M_JOB, M_ROLE, M_REGDATE) values (#{mem_id}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{m_job}, 'mem', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PASSWD=#{m_passwd}, M_NAME=#{m_name}, M_EMAIL=#{m_email}, M_PHONE=#{m_phone}, ZIPCODE=#{zipcode}, ADDRESS=#{address}, ADDRESS2=#{address2}, M_JOB=#{m_job}, M_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID=#{mem_id}
